text: Harris-Chilton-Ruble House, also known as the Chilton House, is a historic home located at New Franklin, Howard County, Missouri. It was built about 1832, and is a two-story, three bay, Federal style brick dwelling. It has a gable roof with projecting cornice and a Victorian era front porch. (includes 13 photographs from 1979) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1982. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Federal architecture in Missouri Category:Houses completed in 1832 Category:Buildings and structures in Howard County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Howard County, Missouri
title: Harris-Chilton-Ruble House
